text: Hurricane Andres was the first named storm and hurricane of the 2009 Pacific hurricane season. Andres rapidly weakened on the morning of June 24 to a tropical storm. It again weakened to a tropical depression on the afternoon of June 24. Then it began to dissipate. Category:East Pacific hurricanes Category:Hurricanes in Mexico Category:2009 in weather Category:2009 in North America Category:2000s in Mexico
title: Hurricane Andres (2009)
